## Input

### Response 1: 
Yes, here is a list of flights that were canceled from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) for American Airlines in December of 2020: 

02 December 2020 - 8:00 am LAX to DFW (90 minutes delayed) 
05 December 2020 - 11:24 pm LAX to JFK (overnight delay)
06 December 2020 - 2:45 pm LAX to Dallas/Ft. Worth (late take-off) 
09 December 2020 - 9:29 pm LAX to Dallas/Ft. Worth (2 hour and 22 minutes delayed) 
10 December 2020 - 6:15 pm LAX to Philadelphia (2 hour and 15 minute delayed) 
11 December 2020 - 8:06 am LAX to DFW (5 hour and 19 minutes delayed) 
11 December 2020 - 2:03 pm LAX to Miami (3 hour and 41 minutes delayed)
12 December 2020 - 10:21 am LAX to DFW (3 hours and 16 minutes delayed) 
13 December 2020 - 4:50 pm LAX to Charlotte (4 hours and 2 minutes delayed) 
14 December 2020 - 9:24 pm LAX to Philadelphia (2 hour and 53 minutes delayed)
16 December 2020 - 8:10 pm LAX to Boston (2 hours and 17 minutes delayed)

### Response 2: 
Yes. Here is a list of flights that were canceled out of LAX in December 20

## Answer
2
